title: The Week in pictures. Issue no. 300
brief_description: Magazine style newsreel with four short pieces. 1. Alex Carr the lion tamer from Bertrand Mills Circus puts the lions through their paces. 2. Shows how road research is helping to design better and safer roads. 3. London fashion review. Shows actress Moira Lister modelling clothes and someone who looks remarkably like Audrey Hepburn. 4. Comedy piece with Sam Costa and the Mayfair club with drinks at 1939 prices. Issue number 300.
